ghostAuthor.bio: "The greatest discovery of my generation is that a human being can alter his life by altering his attitudes"

node.title: People with low self-esteem
node.excerpt: If 'pride' arises from interactions with other people, then 'self-esteem' has to be found within yourself. Rather than an objective and neutral judgment, it has a strong feeling of subjectiveness.

node.meta_description: This low self-esteem is a big problem in life. This is because it affects the people around you, not just your own problems.

primary_author.name: Daegyun Na
primary_author.bio: "The greatest discovery of my generation is that a human being can alter his life by altering his attitudes"

node.plaintext:
> Self-esteem is the concept of recognizing that you are good and deserving of
attention. People with high self-esteem can establish their identity properly in
their lives. This is because high self-esteem allows you to confidently
challenge and achieve whatever you do.
On the other hand, people with low self-esteem often have difficulty doing
anything. Self-esteem and pride are often confused. However, the difference is
that self-esteem means affirmation of what it is as it is, whereas pride means
affirmation in competition.

If 'pride' arises from interactions with other people, then 'self-esteem' has to
be found within yourself. Rather than an objective and neutral judgment, it has
a strong feeling of subjectiveness.

Photo by Priscilla Du Preez
[https://unsplash.com/@priscilladupreez?utm_source=ghost&utm_medium=referral&utm_campaign=api-credit] 
/ Unsplash
[https://unsplash.com/?utm_source=ghost&utm_medium=referral&utm_campaign=api-credit]> 
“You are useless.”
How do you feel when you read this sentence? are you feeling very bad, do you
want to refute, or is it just seen as part of the sentence? The more you
naturally understand after hearing that, the less self-esteem you may be. Low
self-esteem means that you value yourself low. That is why you think that you
are incompetent and useless.

On the other hand, people with high self-esteem will react in two ways when they
are told that they are useless.

One thing is to defend yourself and you list your strengths and strengths, and
for this reason, you will think and say that you are never useless.

Another thing is that when you hear such a statement, you don't react because
you already know that you are useless, and you don't even feel the need to
react.

If you feel that more than one of the lists below is true, your self-esteem is
most likely to be low.

Photo by Christian Meier
[https://unsplash.com/@svenglueckspilz?utm_source=ghost&utm_medium=referral&utm_campaign=api-credit] 
/ Unsplash
[https://unsplash.com/?utm_source=ghost&utm_medium=referral&utm_campaign=api-credit]
Here are general characteristics of people with low self-esteem.

People with low self-esteem
They care too much what people think
They often think about what other people think if I act like this and  they
ignore me.

Their own way of interpreting
Just laughing at them feels like they have already been attacked. They think
about what others say and give meaning to it.

They can't believe you compliment  them
They don't like it and doubt it even when they praise it.

They can't make eye contact
When they are talking to someone, if they make eye contact for a moment, they
willl stutter.

My fault if others get angry
If my friend with me is in a bad mood, I wonder if I'm in a bad mood, so I look
back on my behavior.

I'm depressed even once pointed out
When criticized, they fall into the end of depression, and even a few of their
motivation disappears.

Easily swayed by what others say
They believes in everything they hear and they think everything others say is
more correct than them.

No self-assertion
They say "I hate it but I can’t say I don’t like it"

Afraid of new challenges
They think it would be better to do what I always do as the image of failing
before they even challenge is drawn in their mind.

They belittle themselves
They compare themselves to others and blame themselves for not liking them.

Photo by Christopher Beloch
[https://unsplash.com/@cbeloch?utm_source=ghost&utm_medium=referral&utm_campaign=api-credit] 
/ Unsplash
[https://unsplash.com/?utm_source=ghost&utm_medium=referral&utm_campaign=api-credit]
People with low self-esteem are more likely to be wielded by the opinions of
others. It's because they put the standard of value judgment outside themselves,
not inside them. You will lower your abilities and the outcomes you have
achieved by meeting the standards of others. There are many people who look
at'How will other people see me?' and think,'If you know me deeply, you will be
disappointed.'‌‌People with low self-esteem also have severe emotional
fluctuations. The reason is clear. You can protect your self-esteem by focusing
on the opinions of others who have hurt your feelings, because it is difficult
because you do not believe in yourself. It is easy to understand when you think
of a boat that is not properly centered. Because it is not centered, it stumbles
even in a brief shower and sinks in shallow waves.

Also, people with low self-esteem think that they are toxic. Others seem to have
a different meaning to them even if they just laugh, and for some reason, they
think that others will judge me badly. Even if they succeed in any job, they
cannot be happy. I feel anxious despite being happy, thinking that happiness now
will not last long. Rather, they easily get used to the experience of failure
rather than success. Looking at the collapse of myself, I think that I knew this
would happen because my value was originally low.

This low self-esteem is a big problem in life. This is because it affects the
people around you, not just your own problems. Lack of respect and love for
yourself means that there is something inside that is not filled. Everyone has a
tendency to fill in what is lacking. So, people with low self-esteem turn to the
outside to fill in the empty inside. You want to get love and attention from
others, but it's like pouring water into the poison underneath. I try to fill
the poison that keeps draining, so no matter how much I pour it, it's not
enough. The more loved you receive, the more you will want from the other
person. Furthermore, they want to meet the perfect person who does not hurt
them, who unconditionally fits their needs.

But there is no such person in the world. Because everyone lives by instinct for
their own satisfaction as independent beings. No one was born to fit someone
perfectly. Because you want other people to have a heart that you can't fill
yourself with, you continue to hurt others and hurt yourself.

Photo by Jez Timms
[https://unsplash.com/@jeztimms?utm_source=ghost&utm_medium=referral&utm_campaign=api-credit] 
/ Unsplash
[https://unsplash.com/?utm_source=ghost&utm_medium=referral&utm_campaign=api-credit]
Let's discuss child with high self-esteem [/child-with-high-self-esteem/] in the
next post.‌‌
node.html:
Self-esteem is the concept of recognizing that you are good and deserving of attention. People with high self-esteem can establish their identity properly in their lives. This is because high self-esteem allows you to confidently challenge and achieve whatever you do.

On the other hand, people with low self-esteem often have difficulty doing anything. Self-esteem and pride are often confused. However, the difference is that self-esteem means affirmation of what it is as it is, whereas pride means affirmation in competition.

If 'pride' arises from interactions with other people, then 'self-esteem' has to be found within yourself. Rather than an objective and neutral judgment, it has a strong feeling of subjectiveness.

“You are useless.”

How do you feel when you read this sentence? are you feeling very bad, do you want to refute, or is it just seen as part of the sentence? The more you naturally understand after hearing that, the less self-esteem you may be. Low self-esteem means that you value yourself low. That is why you think that you are incompetent and useless.

On the other hand, people with high self-esteem will react in two ways when they are told that they are useless.

One thing is to defend yourself and you list your strengths and strengths, and for this reason, you will think and say that you are never useless.

Another thing is that when you hear such a statement, you don't react because you already know that you are useless, and you don't even feel the need to react.

If you feel that more than one of the lists below is true, your self-esteem is most likely to be low.

Here are general characteristics of people with low self-esteem.

People with low self-esteem

They care too much what people think

They often think about what other people think if I act like this and they ignore me.

Their own way of interpreting

Just laughing at them feels like they have already been attacked. They think about what others say and give meaning to it.

They can't believe you compliment them

They don't like it and doubt it even when they praise it.

They can't make eye contact

When they are talking to someone, if they make eye contact for a moment, they willl stutter.

My fault if others get angry

If my friend with me is in a bad mood, I wonder if I'm in a bad mood, so I look back on my behavior.

I'm depressed even once pointed out

When criticized, they fall into the end of depression, and even a few of their motivation disappears.

Easily swayed by what others say

They believes in everything they hear and they think everything others say is more correct than them.

No self-assertion

They say "I hate it but I can’t say I don’t like it"

Afraid of new challenges

They think it would be better to do what I always do as the image of failing before they even challenge is drawn in their mind.

They belittle themselves

They compare themselves to others and blame themselves for not liking them.

People with low self-esteem are more likely to be wielded by the opinions of others. It's because they put the standard of value judgment outside themselves, not inside them. You will lower your abilities and the outcomes you have achieved by meeting the standards of others. There are many people who look at'How will other people see me?' and think,'If you know me deeply, you will be disappointed.'‌‌People with low self-esteem also have severe emotional fluctuations. The reason is clear. You can protect your self-esteem by focusing on the opinions of others who have hurt your feelings, because it is difficult because you do not believe in yourself. It is easy to understand when you think of a boat that is not properly centered. Because it is not centered, it stumbles even in a brief shower and sinks in shallow waves.

Also, people with low self-esteem think that they are toxic. Others seem to have a different meaning to them even if they just laugh, and for some reason, they think that others will judge me badly. Even if they succeed in any job, they cannot be happy. I feel anxious despite being happy, thinking that happiness now will not last long. Rather, they easily get used to the experience of failure rather than success. Looking at the collapse of myself, I think that I knew this would happen because my value was originally low.

This low self-esteem is a big problem in life. This is because it affects the people around you, not just your own problems. Lack of respect and love for yourself means that there is something inside that is not filled. Everyone has a tendency to fill in what is lacking. So, people with low self-esteem turn to the outside to fill in the empty inside. You want to get love and attention from others, but it's like pouring water into the poison underneath. I try to fill the poison that keeps draining, so no matter how much I pour it, it's not enough. The more loved you receive, the more you will want from the other person. Furthermore, they want to meet the perfect person who does not hurt them, who unconditionally fits their needs.

But there is no such person in the world. Because everyone lives by instinct for their own satisfaction as independent beings. No one was born to fit someone perfectly. Because you want other people to have a heart that you can't fill yourself with, you continue to hurt others and hurt yourself.

Let's discuss child with high self-esteem in the next post.‌‌

Even if they succeed in any job, they cannot be happy. I feel anxious despite being happy, thinking that happiness now will not last long. Rather, they easily get used to the experience of failure rather than success. Looking at the collapse of myself, I think that I knew this would happen because my value was originally low.

This low self-esteem is a big problem in life. This is because it affects the people around you, not just your own problems. Lack of respect and love for yourself means that there is something inside that is not filled. Everyone has a tendency to fill in what is lacking. Furthermore, they want to meet the perfect person who does not hurt them, who unconditionally fits their needs.

But there is no such person in the world. Because everyone lives by instinct for their own satisfaction as independent beings. No one was born to fit someone perfectly. Because you want other people to have a heart that you can't fill yourself with, you continue to hurt others and hurt yourself.

node.title: People with high self-esteem
node.excerpt: When you see happy people regardless of the environment, they have their own characteristics. It is that they have the power to be grateful for even the smallest things.
node.custom_excerpt: When you see happy people regardless of the environment, they have their own characteristics. It is that they have the power to be grateful for even the smallest things.
node.meta_description: People with high self-esteem never depend, and they are not afraid of mistakes also not afraid of rejection. They acknowledge their weaknesses.

authors.name: Daegyun Na
authors.bio: "The greatest discovery of my generation is that a human being can alter his life by altering his attitudes"

primary_author.name: Daegyun Na
primary_author.bio: "The greatest discovery of my generation is that a human being can alter his life by altering his attitudes"

node.plaintext:
> When you see happy people regardless of the environment, they have their own
characteristics. They have the power to be grateful for even the smallest
things.
Let's talk about the characteristics and commonalities of people with high
self-esteem. Self-esteem affects our lives more than we think and can make us
more positive and energetic. as posted earlier, self-esteem is a heart to
respect one's dignity, love one's self, and respect one's self. The smaller the
size of this mind is, the easier it is to be shaken by the wrods and
circumstances of the people around you and hurt yourself without your knowledge. 

If so, let's think about what characteristics of people with high self-esteem
have in common.

Photo by Oziel Gómez
[https://unsplash.com/@ozgomz?utm_source=ghost&utm_medium=referral&utm_campaign=api-credit] 
/ Unsplash
[https://unsplash.com/?utm_source=ghost&utm_medium=referral&utm_campaign=api-credit]
People with high self-esteem
Don't depend
People with high self-esteem never depend. As your heart to seek recognition and
empathy from the other person is increased, your dependence will eventually
increase. Efforts to build yourself up is more important than the stability
gained by depending on the other person.

Not afraid of mistakes
Everyone makes mistakes. We learn and grow from mistakes, but people with low
self-esteem are busy blaming themselves for mistakes. When we work thinking that
no one is perfect, mistakes become a factor that grows us.

Don't be afraid of rejection
In life, there are cases when you ask someone to ask for it. People with high
self-esteem are not hurt even if they are rejected by the other person. If I
have the right to make an offer to the other person, the other person has the
right to decline the offer. Most people don't refuse because they hate you.

Acknowledge your weaknesses
People have many weaknesses. Rather than trying to hide your weaknesses, you
need to be confident and accept them. If you admit your weaknesses as they are,
weaknesses can turn into strengths. People with low self-esteem see only
weaknesses in themselves.

Don't care about others' eyes
People with high self-esteem do not confine themselves to public appraisal. You
don't care how others see you, you just do your job. He refers to other people's
opinions, but only if he is not influenced, he can live his own life. We have
the right to choose our own life and live independently.

Photo by Wilhelm Gunkel
[https://unsplash.com/@wilhelmgunkel?utm_source=ghost&utm_medium=referral&utm_campaign=api-credit] 
/ Unsplash
[https://unsplash.com/?utm_source=ghost&utm_medium=referral&utm_campaign=api-credit]
Don't blame
If you have low self-esteem, it's easy to attribute the cause to others. You are
responsible for what you decide. People with high self-esteem are never to
blame. They know how to accept the results, take them humbly, and try to do the
next job.

Don't misrepresent the other person
People with low self-esteem are busy trying to misrepresent others if they don't
misrepresent themselves. Conversely, a person with high self-esteem appreciates
and praises the other person's strengths. Looking at the bad points, it is easy
to see only the endless bad parts. People who love me don't hate others.

Not very angry
People with strong self-esteem do not get angry. I am not easily hurt by what
others say, and I rarely get angry after all. When you're angry, focus on
resolving your feelings and ask,'Is this really something that makes you angry?'
I worry. A person with weak self-esteem gets angry when he has a strong heart to
protect himself.

Like new things
People with high self-esteem make life decisions according to their will. He is
not afraid of new things and has the courage to pioneer. He doesn't get all the
results he wants by buying a new job. However, a person with high self-esteem
only lives with his or her life at risk.

Don't obsess over self-esteem
Those who succeed objectively do not necessarily have high self-esteem.
Self-esteem can be low or high depending on the situation. The self-esteem built
up by force is unsettling. It is better to recognize and love the way you are,
rather than trying to increase your self-esteem.

Photo by Maria Teneva
[https://unsplash.com/@miteneva?utm_source=ghost&utm_medium=referral&utm_campaign=api-credit] 
/ Unsplash
[https://unsplash.com/?utm_source=ghost&utm_medium=referral&utm_campaign=api-credit]
Let's talk about people with low self-esteem [/people-with-low-self-esteem/] in
the next post.
node.html:
When you see happy people regardless of the environment, they have their own characteristics. They have the power to be grateful for even the smallest things.

Let's talk about the characteristics and commonalities of people with high self-esteem. Self-esteem affects our lives more than we think and can make us more positive and energetic. as posted earlier, self-esteem is a heart to respect one's dignity, love one's self, and respect one's self. The smaller the size of this mind is, the easier it is to be shaken by the wrods and circumstances of the people around you and hurt yourself without your knowledge.

If so, let's think about what characteristics of people with high self-esteem have in common.

People with high self-esteem

Don't depend

People with high self-esteem never depend. As your heart to seek recognition and empathy from the other person is increased, your dependence will eventually increase. Efforts to build yourself up is more important than the stability gained by depending on the other person.

Not afraid of mistakes

Everyone makes mistakes. We learn and grow from mistakes, but people with low self-esteem are busy blaming themselves for mistakes. When we work thinking that no one is perfect, mistakes become a factor that grows us.

Don't be afraid of rejection

In life, there are cases when you ask someone to ask for it. People with high self-esteem are not hurt even if they are rejected by the other person. If I have the right to make an offer to the other person, the other person has the right to decline the offer. Most people don't refuse because they hate you.

Acknowledge your weaknesses

People have many weaknesses. Rather than trying to hide your weaknesses, you need to be confident and accept them. If you admit your weaknesses as they are, weaknesses can turn into strengths. People with low self-esteem see only weaknesses in themselves.

Don't care about others' eyes

People with high self-esteem do not confine themselves to public appraisal. You don't care how others see you, you just do your job. He refers to other people's opinions, but only if he is not influenced, he can live his own life. We have the right to choose our own life and live independently.

Don't blame

If you have low self-esteem, it's easy to attribute the cause to others. You are responsible for what you decide. People with high self-esteem are never to blame. They know how to accept the results, take them humbly, and try to do the next job.

Don't misrepresent the other person

People with low self-esteem are busy trying to misrepresent others if they don't misrepresent themselves. Conversely, a person with high self-esteem appreciates and praises the other person's strengths. Looking at the bad points, it is easy to see only the endless bad parts. People who love me don't hate others.

Not very angry

People with strong self-esteem do not get angry. I am not easily hurt by what others say, and I rarely get angry after all. When you're angry, focus on resolving your feelings and ask,'Is this really something that makes you angry?' I worry. A person with weak self-esteem gets angry when he has a strong heart to protect himself.

Like new things

People with high self-esteem make life decisions according to their will. He is not afraid of new things and has the courage to pioneer. He doesn't get all the results he wants by buying a new job. However, a person with high self-esteem only lives with his or her life at risk.

Don't obsess over self-esteem

Those who succeed objectively do not necessarily have high self-esteem. Self-esteem can be low or high depending on the situation. The self-esteem built up by force is unsettling. It is better to recognize and love the way you are, rather than trying to increase your self-esteem.

Let's talk about people with low self-esteem in the next post.

childHtmlRehype.html:
When you see happy people regardless of the environment, they have their own characteristics. They have the power to be grateful for even the smallest things.

Let's talk about the characteristics and commonalities of people with high self-esteem. Self-esteem affects our lives more than we think and can make us more positive and energetic. as posted earlier, self-esteem is a heart to respect one's dignity, love one's self, and respect one's self. The smaller the size of this mind is, the easier it is to be shaken by the wrods and circumstances of the people around you and hurt yourself without your knowledge.

If so, let's think about what characteristics of people with high self-esteem have in common.

People with high self-esteem

Don't depend

People with high self-esteem never depend. As your heart to seek recognition and empathy from the other person is increased, your dependence will eventually increase. Efforts to build yourself up is more important than the stability gained by depending on the other person.

Not afraid of mistakes

Everyone makes mistakes. We learn and grow from mistakes, but people with low self-esteem are busy blaming themselves for mistakes. When we work thinking that no one is perfect, mistakes become a factor that grows us.

Don't be afraid of rejection

In life, there are cases when you ask someone to ask for it. People with high self-esteem are not hurt even if they are rejected by the other person. If I have the right to make an offer to the other person, the other person has the right to decline the offer. Most people don't refuse because they hate you.

Acknowledge your weaknesses

People have many weaknesses. Rather than trying to hide your weaknesses, you need to be confident and accept them. If you admit your weaknesses as they are, weaknesses can turn into strengths. People with low self-esteem see only weaknesses in themselves.

Don't care about others' eyes

People with high self-esteem do not confine themselves to public appraisal. You don't care how others see you, you just do your job. He refers to other people's opinions, but only if he is not influenced, he can live his own life. We have the right to choose our own life and live independently.

Don't blame

If you have low self-esteem, it's easy to attribute the cause to others. You are responsible for what you decide. People with high self-esteem are never to blame. They know how to accept the results, take them humbly, and try to do the next job.

Don't misrepresent the other person

People with low self-esteem are busy trying to misrepresent others if they don't misrepresent themselves. Conversely, a person with high self-esteem appreciates and praises the other person's strengths. Looking at the bad points, it is easy to see only the endless bad parts. People who love me don't hate others.

Not very angry

People with strong self-esteem do not get angry. I am not easily hurt by what others say, and I rarely get angry after all. When you're angry, focus on resolving your feelings and ask,'Is this really something that makes you angry?' I worry. A person with weak self-esteem gets angry when he has a strong heart to protect himself.

Like new things

People with high self-esteem make life decisions according to their will. He is not afraid of new things and has the courage to pioneer. He doesn't get all the results he wants by buying a new job. However, a person with high self-esteem only lives with his or her life at risk.

Don't obsess over self-esteem

Those who succeed objectively do not necessarily have high self-esteem. Self-esteem can be low or high depending on the situation. The self-esteem built up by force is unsettling. It is better to recognize and love the way you are, rather than trying to increase your self-esteem.

Let's talk about people with low self-esteem in the next post.

node.title: Self-esteem
node.excerpt: People generally say that high-self-esteem makes people think in a positive way and everything goes well because of the high-self-esteem. On the contrary, low-self-esteem makes people think in a negative way which makes everything goes not well. What's self-esteem?
node.custom_excerpt: People generally say that high-self-esteem makes people think in a positive way and everything goes well because of the high-self-esteem. On the contrary, low-self-esteem makes people think in a negative way which makes everything goes not well. What's self-esteem?
node.meta_description: People generally say that high-self-esteem makes people think in a positive way and everything goes well because of the high-self-esteem.

authors.name: Daegyun Na
authors.bio: "The greatest discovery of my generation is that a human being can alter his life by altering his attitudes"

primary_author.name: Daegyun Na
primary_author.bio: "The greatest discovery of my generation is that a human being can alter his life by altering his attitudes"

node.plaintext:
What is self-esteem?
Self-esteem is the feeling of accepting yourself positively by thinking that you
are valuable and keeping the high dignity of yourself. In other words, it means
that you self-evaluate yourself, your value, abilitiese and aptitudes positively
and love yourself. Those who have positive feelings toward themselves are
generally positive toward others, whereas those who view themselves negatively
are generally said to be negative toward others. 

If we want to live a worthwhile life, there are things we must do. it is respect
and love yourself. Those who hate themselves can do nothing of value, and people
who don't know that they are loved and precious are busy to take a pessimistic
view of life and the world.

Photo by Paola Chaaya
[https://unsplash.com/@paolitta?utm_source=ghost&utm_medium=referral&utm_campaign=api-credit] 
/ Unsplash
[https://unsplash.com/?utm_source=ghost&utm_medium=referral&utm_campaign=api-credit]
These days, a feeling of hatred for you and others replaces your self-esteem.
Those who fail to hate others blame and demean themselves. A distorted mind only
ruins themselves.

They think that only matter and wealth are the whole world, and if they can't
have it, they dismiss it as unhappy. Economic conditions do not make our lives
happy. Diverse lives enrich us, and our existence alone can be respected. What
we need in the present is self-esteem.

Photo by Annie Spratt
[https://unsplash.com/@anniespratt?utm_source=ghost&utm_medium=referral&utm_campaign=api-credit] 
/ Unsplash
[https://unsplash.com/?utm_source=ghost&utm_medium=referral&utm_campaign=api-credit]
Let's look at the characteristics of people with high self-esteem
[/people-with-high-self-esteem] in next post.
node.html:
What is self-esteem?

Self-esteem is the feeling of accepting yourself positively by thinking that you are valuable and keeping the high dignity of yourself. In other words, it means that you self-evaluate yourself, your value, abilitiese and aptitudes positively and love yourself. Those who have positive feelings toward themselves are generally positive toward others, whereas those who view themselves negatively are generally said to be negative toward others.

If we want to live a worthwhile life, there are things we must do. it is respect and love yourself. Those who hate themselves can do nothing of value, and people who don't know that they are loved and precious are busy to take a pessimistic view of life and the world.

These days, a feeling of hatred for you and others replaces your self-esteem. Those who fail to hate others blame and demean themselves. A distorted mind only ruins themselves.

They think that only matter and wealth are the whole world, and if they can't have it, they dismiss it as unhappy. Economic conditions do not make our lives happy. Diverse lives enrich us, and our existence alone can be respected. What we need in the present is self-esteem.

Let's look at the characteristics of people with high self-esteem in next post.
